personalInfo.name: Xevi Olivas
personalInfo.title: Aspiring AI Data Analyst / Developer
personalInfo.summary: Passionate AI/ML developer specializing in computer vision and RAG systems. Completed undergraduate thesis on AI-powered exam proctoring achieving 92% accuracy with 500+ student tests. Experienced in building production-ready AI systems using YOLOv8, MediaPipe, Next.js, and modern web frameworks.
personalInfo.tagline: Building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems through AI/ML innovation

achievements: Completed thesis: Powered Proctoring - AI-Based Exam Monitoring System
Achieved 92% detection accuracy across 500+ student test sessions
Led team of developers in full-stack AI application development
